entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 4:17 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Fog. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
